|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 10/01/2021 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== *Wireless LAN + Bluetooth 5.1 Combo Module :802.11ax 2x2 Wi-Fi 6 SU and MU-MIMO DBC
*[[Marvell#ax]] 88W9098 - PCIe 3.0 (WLAN)/SDIO 3.0 (BT)/UART :802.11abgn+ac+ax 2T2R (2x2:2), Wi-Fi 6, MU-MIMO, BT 5.1
*Dual, independent direct-conversion WLAN radios :(with dual-MACs and dual-Basebands) supports :true, simultaneous WLAN network operation at 2 :different frequency bands,
{{See also|AzureWave|Marvell}}
*FCC ID: TLZ-XM9098 (10/01/2021) :Brand Name: AzureWave / Model No. : :[[AzureWave]] AW-XM458/AW-XM458MA (LGA/M.2) :[[AzureWave]] AW-XM369/AW-XM369MA (LGA/M.2) <!-- ===Drivers=== *[https://www.station-drivers.com/index.php?option=com_remository&Itemid=352&func=fileinfo&id=4901&lang=en PCI ID: '''10ec:8852''' on ''station-drivers''] ([https://devicehunt.com/view/type/pci/vendor/10EC/device/8852 DH]) :[[Realtek]] RTL8852AE {{#set:Probable Linux driver=rtw89}} -->
==See also== *[[AzureWave AW-XB468NF]] (AX1800) • [[ASUS PCE-AX1800]] :[[MediaTek]] MT7921LEN (2T2R) 802.11ax *[[AzureWave AW-XB473NF]] (AX1800) • [https://24wireless.info/wifi-6-module-for-pc PR] :[[Realtek]] RTL8852AE (2T2R) 802.11ax *[[AzureWave AW-XB503NF]] (AX1800) • [https://24wireless.info/wifi-6-module-for-pc PR] :[[Realtek]] RTL8852AE-VT (1T2R) 802.11ax <!-- (RTL8852AE-VT has 1T2R only) -->
